s.text: If demand for shares remains strong, companies eventually offer more shares for sale in secondary offerings.

Given that, more Net companies should think about forgoing the pleasure of getting big headlines after their first day of trading and choose instead to get a real sense of what the market thinks of them.
When it comes to stocks, rarity doesn't mean value in the long run.
When it comes to stocks, rarity doesn't mean value in the long run.
